Welcome to Machine Cleaning 2018 documentation!
=======================================================================
This set of modules aids in the initial preprocessing of features for line item cleaning when we import data directly from ESH's databases, as well as provides some general Machine Learning helper functions. The sql files for line items (and frns) data should be stored in the `sql/` folder within the `src/` main directory.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
